rows.label: qst702505_msg0001
rows.name: Prince Adel! Emperor Hugo!

rows.label: qst702505_msg0002
rows.name:
We are so very sorry to have
beleaguered you with such trouble!
I assure you, it won't happen again!

rows.label: qst702505_msg0003
rows.name:
Don't stand on ceremony so much,
Karina! Anyhow, the damage doesn't
seem to be too great.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0004
rows.name: Right, Hugo?

rows.label: qst702505_msg0005
rows.name:
It is so. The war-novices were ably
defended, despite our numbers.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0006
rows.name: There were a few breaches, mind...

rows.label: qst702505_msg0007
rows.name:
It's alright. The important thing is that
you and Karina are alive and well.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0008
rows.name:
You did a great job and you're both
still in one piece. Don't be so hard on
yourself.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0009
rows.name: Your Majesty!

rows.label: qst702505_msg0010
rows.name:
That means a lot to me, Your Majesty.
If only I had your wisdom and bravery...

rows.label: qst702505_msg0011
rows.name:
Then maybe I'd be able to do a bit
more to help my prince and my people.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0012
rows.name:
Noel... Don't do yourself down.
You are brave.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0013
rows.name:
Noel's right, Your Majesty.
He hasn't a hope of holding a candle
to your qualities.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0014
rows.name:
Thanks, Karina.
Really nicely put, that is.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0021
rows.name:
But, anyway... I felt like I witnessed true
heroes in action today. Keep that up,
and Metsu doesn't have a chance!

rows.label: qst702505_msg0022
rows.name:
We aren't as powerful as you, Prince
Adel, but when the time comes, we'll
give everything we've got.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0023
rows.name:
That's right. We believe in you, Prince
Adel. You're the one that can create
a peaceful future for us.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0024
rows.name:
I really appreciate that... I promise to
do everything I can to make that future
a reality.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0025
rows.name:
The cares hang heavy on your face,
Prince.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0026
rows.name:
Well...I'm pleased that they trust me,
but from time to time...I wonder if
they're wise to do so.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0027
rows.name:
I don't know if I can live up to this
ideal that everyone has of me.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0028
rows.name:
I'm only human...not a god.
I come up against my limits
every single day.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0029
rows.name:
Mortal men, and not divine.
But set apart by blood and nobility.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0030
rows.name:
Prince Adel. You should hold up
your head with pride before the people.
Resolute and unbowed.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0031
rows.name:
Such is the burden of one who leads
his people.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0032
rows.name: A heavy burden indeed.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0033
rows.name: But, that's the way it is.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0034
rows.name:
Yeah. Not many people realize that it's
tough to be royal. It's about the biggest
responsibility you can shoulder.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0035
rows.name:
But at least you don't have to bear
it alone.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0036
rows.name:
Some things will always be difficult.
But whatever's heavy can be made
lighter when friends help to carry it.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0037
rows.name: Wise words, Laura

rows.label: qst702505_msg0038
rows.name: I knew you'd say something like that.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0039
rows.name:
Oh Laura-sama! I just love those
nuggets of wisdom!

rows.label: qst702505_msg0040
rows.name:
I agree. Nothing is easy in life. But still,
we strive ever onwards, aiding one
another in whatever way we can.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0041
rows.name:
To be the hands of His Majesty, to
share in both his joys and sorrows...
That is the foundation of our honor.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0042
rows.name: My most loyal subjects...

rows.label: qst702505_msg0043
rows.name:
This whole Driver and Blade thing?
We're almost like one person in two
bodies. Don't you think?

rows.label: qst702505_msg0044
rows.name:
So you just need to let me take a little
of that burden sometimes, no?

rows.label: qst702505_msg0045
rows.name: Gah...

rows.label: qst702505_msg0046
rows.name: Hey... What's wrong?

rows.label: qst702505_msg0047
rows.name: Stop bottling it up, Adel.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0048
rows.name:
I... You guys... I'm just realizing what a
lucky man I am to have such friends.

rows.label: qst702505_msg0049
rows.name: Thank you. Thank you all...
